title: [ bug ] Power Lora Loader - typed `clip` values go to `model`
body:
There is still a bug in this node:

When we type a value in the `clip` slider, it goes to the `model` slider, instead.
author: JorgeR81
satisfaction_conditions: Input values typed into the 'clip' slider must correctly apply to the clip parameter
Parameter assignment logic must maintain strict separation between model and clip components
